resources.string: You have not yet paired with any devices. Pair with a new device to get started.
Device has already been paired with.
Failed to pair with device, it\'s not a heat pump!
Fill in a username and a friendly name that the device will be remembered by.\n\nUsername should only contain plain lowercase letters.
Failed to pair, username already taken!
Failed to connect, device is not a heat pump.
Failed updating heat pump. You are likely using an incorrect version of heat pump software, contact your administrator.
Failed to connect, you are not paired with this device.
Fill in your display name here. Other users of shared devices can see this display name.

Here you can reset your client private key. This key is used for authentication with a device. Resetting will delete the current private key and create a new one for you. You will have to redo pairing with your devices in this case. Only reset your client private key when you absolutely have to. Your current private key is
Here you can reset your remembered devices. Note that you\'re still paired with the devices, you will have to add them again using discover or pairing string.
Are you sure you want to clear all remembered devices?
Are you sure you want to delete your current private key and generate a new one?
Your private key has been regenerated.
Your list of remembered devices have been cleared.
